Summary: 3 points of light moving in loose formation at high speed
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and a friend were standing on my porch in South porland looking at stars. We noticed three points of light in a loose triangle formation moving across the sky. The objects moved from one side of the sky to the other in just a few seconds. An airplane was taking of from the Portland International Jetport at the same time. The 3 points of light appeared to be at a much higher altitude than the jet. The triangle formation that the k=lights held seemed to be much much larger than a jet. I was very weird.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in South Portland
There were no other sightings in South Portland on or around November 16th 2009
